mapper.select:
SELECT datas.or_serial_special_number, datas.or_buyer_id, datas.ss_name, datas.or_buyer_another_name, datas.or_shipping_address_detail, datas.or_buyer_name, datas.or_receiver_name, datas.or_shipping_address, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT datas.or_delivery_invoice_number SEPARATOR ',') AS or_delivery_invoice_number, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT datas.or_delivery_company SEPARATOR ',') AS or_delivery_company, datas.or_buyer_contract_number1, datas.or_receiver_contract_number1, SUM(datas.or_total_price) AS or_total_price, COUNT(datas.or_pk) AS total_order_count, SUM(datas.or_amount) AS or_amount, SUM(datas.or_cancled_qty) AS or_cancled_qty, datas.or_sending_deadline, SUBSTRING_INDEX(GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT datas.or_sending_day ORDER BY or_sending_day DESC SEPARATOR ',' ), ',', 1) AS or_sending_day, SUBSTRING_INDEX(GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT datas.or_settlement_day ORDER BY or_settlement_day DESC SEPARATOR ',' ), ',', 1) AS or_settlement_day, SUM(datas.or_refunds) AS or_refunds, datas.edt_fk, datas.or_rec_type, SUM(datas.or_excel_div_flag) AS or_excel_div_flag, IF( SUM(datas.or_deposit_flag) IS NULL, 0, 1) AS or_deposit_flag FROM ( SELECT od.or_serial_special_number, od.or_buyer_id, ss.ss_name, od.or_buyer_name, od.or_buyer_another_name, od.or_receiver_name, od.or_shipping_address, od.or_shipping_address_detail, od.or_delivery_invoice_number, od.or_delivery_company, od.or_buyer_contract_number1, od.or_receiver_contract_number1, od.or_pk, od.or_total_price, od.or_sending_deadline, od.or_sending_day, od.or_cancled_flag, od.or_refunds, od.or_settlement_day, od.or_rec_type, CASE WHEN od.or_cancled_flag = 0 THEN SUM(od.or_amount) END AS or_amount, CASE WHEN od.or_cancled_flag = 1 THEN SUM(od.or_amount) END AS or_cancled_qty, od.edt_fk, SUM(od.or_excel_div_flag) AS or_excel_div_flag, CASE WHEN od.or_deposit_flag = 0 THEN SUM(od.or_amount) END AS or_deposit_flag FROM orders od INNER JOIN store_section ss ON od.ss_fk = ss.ss_pk INNER JOIN ( SELECT od.or_serial_special_number, COUNT(od.or_serial_special_number) AS serial_count, SUM(od.or_inv_flag) AS total_flag FROM orders od LEFT JOIN product_matching pm ON od.pm_fk = pm.pm_pk LEFT JOIN option_matching om ON om.pm_fk = pm.pm_pk AND od.or_product_option = om.om_store_option_name LEFT JOIN options op ON om.option_fk = op.option_pk LEFT JOIN products pro ON pro.product_pk = op.product_fk
AND or_invoice_num_date IN
#{inoviceNum}
AND od.ss_fk = #{ssPk}
AND edt_fk = #{edtFk}
AND ${dateType} >= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d') AND ${dateType} < DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 DAY), '%Y-%m-%d')
AND ${dateType} >= DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW() , INTERVAL -7 DAY), '%Y-%m-%d') AND ${dateType} < DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 DAY), '%Y-%m-%d')
AND ${dateType} >= #{dateStart} AND ${dateType} < DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(#{dateEnd}, INTERVAL 1 DAY), '%Y-%m-%d')
AND od.or_regdate = #{insertingCount}
AND (or_delivery_invoice_number IS NOT NULL AND or_delivery_invoice_number != '')
AND (or_delivery_invoice_number IS NULL OR or_delivery_invoice_number = '')
AND od.or_sending_deadline > DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d')
AND od.or_sending_deadline <= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d')
AND od.or_request = ''
AND od.or_request != ''
AND od.or_sending_day IS NULL
AND od.or_sending_day IS NOT NULL
AND od.or_special_region_flag = 1
AND od.or_special_region_flag = 1 AND od.or_special_region_check_flag = 0
AND od.or_special_region_flag = 1 AND od.or_special_region_check_flag = 1
AND od.or_special_region_flag == 0
AND od.or_deposit_flag = 1
AND od.or_deposit_flag = 0
AND od.or_rec_type = 0
AND od.or_rec_type = 1
AND od.or_rec_type = 2
AND od.or_rec_type = 3
AND od.or_excel_div_flag = 1
AND od.or_fk != 0
AND ( od.or_excel_div_flag = 1 OR od.or_fk != 0 )
AND od.or_excel_div_flag = 0
AND od.or_fk = #{excelOrFk}
AND od.or_refunds != 0
AND od.or_refunds = 0
AND od.or_delivery_price > 0 AND od.or_delivery_discount_price = 0
AND (od.or_delivery_price = 0 OR od.or_delivery_discount_price > 0 )
AND (
or_buyer_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{specialNumber},'%') OR or_receiver_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{specialNumber},'%')
)
AND or_buyer_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND or_buyer_another_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND or_receiver_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND or_buyer_contract_number1 LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND or_receiver_contract_number1 LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND (
or_order_number = #{specialNumber}
)
AND or_delivery_invoice_number LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND (or_shipping_address_detail LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') OR or_shipping_address LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') )
AND or_delivery_message LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND or_product_order_number LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND ( or_product LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') OR or_product_option LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') )
AND pro.product_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND op.option_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
GROUP BY od.or_serial_special_number ) output ON od.or_serial_special_number = output.or_serial_special_number
WHERE
od.or_serial_special_number IN
od.or_serial_special_number NOT IN
( SELECT od.or_serial_special_number FROM orders od LEFT JOIN product_matching pm ON od.pm_fk = pm.pm_pk LEFT JOIN option_matching om ON om.pm_fk = pm.pm_pk AND od.or_product_option = om.om_store_option_name LEFT JOIN options op ON om.option_fk = op.option_pk LEFT JOIN products pro ON pro.product_pk = op.product_fk
AND or_invoice_num_date IN
#{inoviceNum}
AND od.ss_fk = #{ssPk}
AND edt_fk = #{edtFk}
AND ${dateType} >= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d') AND ${dateType} < DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 DAY), '%Y-%m-%d')
AND ${dateType} >= DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW() , INTERVAL -7 DAY), '%Y-%m-%d') AND ${dateType} < DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 DAY), '%Y-%m-%d')
AND ${dateType} >= #{dateStart} AND ${dateType} < DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(#{dateEnd}, INTERVAL 1 DAY), '%Y-%m-%d')
AND od.or_regdate = #{insertingCount}
AND (or_delivery_invoice_number IS NOT NULL AND or_delivery_invoice_number != '')
AND (or_delivery_invoice_number IS NULL OR or_delivery_invoice_number = '')
AND od.or_sending_deadline > DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d')
AND od.or_sending_deadline <= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d')
AND od.or_request = ''
AND od.or_request != ''
AND od.or_sending_day IS NULL
AND od.or_sending_day IS NOT NULL
AND od.or_special_region_flag = 1
AND od.or_special_region_flag = 1 AND od.or_special_region_check_flag = 0
AND od.or_special_region_flag = 1 AND od.or_special_region_check_flag = 1
AND od.or_special_region_flag == 0
AND od.or_deposit_flag = 1
AND od.or_deposit_flag = 0
AND od.or_rec_type = 0
AND od.or_rec_type = 1
AND od.or_rec_type = 2
AND od.or_rec_type = 3
AND od.or_excel_div_flag = 1
AND od.or_fk != 0
AND ( od.or_excel_div_flag = 1 OR od.or_fk != 0 )
AND od.or_excel_div_flag = 0
AND od.or_fk = #{excelOrFk}
AND od.or_refunds != 0
AND od.or_refunds = 0
AND od.or_delivery_price > 0 AND od.or_delivery_discount_price = 0
AND (od.or_delivery_price = 0 OR od.or_delivery_discount_price > 0 )
AND ( or_buyer_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchAddKeyword},'%') OR or_receiver_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchAddKeyword},'%') )
AND or_buyer_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchAddKeyword},'%')
AND or_receiver_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchAddKeyword},'%')
AND or_buyer_contract_number1 LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchAddKeyword},'%')
AND or_receiver_contract_number1 LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchAddKeyword},'%')
AND or_order_number LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchAddKeyword},'%')
AND or_delivery_invoice_number LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchAddKeyword},'%')
AND (or_shipping_address_detail LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchAddKeyword},'%') OR or_shipping_address LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchAddKeyword},'%') )
AND or_delivery_message LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchAddKeyword},'%')
AND or_product_order_number LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchAddKeyword},'%')
AND ( or_product LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchAddKeyword},'%') OR or_product_option LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchAddKeyword},'%') )
AND pro.product_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchAddKeyword},'%')
AND op.option_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchAddKeyword},'%')
GROUP BY od.or_serial_special_number )
GROUP BY od.or_serial_special_number, od.or_buyer_id, ss.ss_name, od.or_buyer_name, od.or_buyer_another_name, od.or_receiver_name, od.or_shipping_address, od.or_shipping_address_detail, od.or_delivery_invoice_number, od.or_delivery_company, od.or_buyer_contract_number1, od.or_receiver_contract_number1, od.or_pk, or_amount, od.or_total_price, od.or_sending_deadline, od.or_sending_day, od.or_cancled_flag, od.or_refunds, od.or_settlement_day, od.or_rec_type, od.edt_fk ORDER BY od.or_settlement_day DESC ) datas GROUP BY datas.or_serial_special_number, datas.or_buyer_id, datas.ss_name, datas.or_buyer_name, datas.or_buyer_another_name, datas.or_receiver_name, datas.or_shipping_address, datas.or_shipping_address_detail, datas.or_buyer_contract_number1, datas.or_receiver_contract_number1, datas.or_sending_deadline, datas.or_rec_type, datas.edt_fk
AND SUM(datas.or_cancled_qty) IS NULL
AND SUM(datas.or_cancled_qty) > 0
AND SUM(datas.or_amount) IS NULL
ORDER BY or_settlement_day DESC LIMIT #{firstRecordIndex}, #{recordCountPerPage}

SELECT COUNT(inne.or_serial_special_number) FROM ( SELECT datas.or_serial_special_number, datas.or_buyer_id, datas.ss_name, datas.or_buyer_another_name, datas.or_shipping_address_detail, datas.or_buyer_name, datas.or_receiver_name, datas.or_shipping_address, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT datas.or_delivery_invoice_number SEPARATOR ',') AS or_delivery_invoice_number, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT or_deposit_flag FROM ( SELECT od.or_serial_special_number, od.or_buyer_id, ss.ss_name, od.or_buyer_name, od.or_buyer_another_name, od.or_receiver_name, od.or_shipping_address, SUM(od.or_inv_flag) AS total_flag FROM orders od LEFT JOIN product_matching pm ON od.pm_fk = pm.pm_pk LEFT JOIN option_matching om ON om.pm_fk = pm.pm_pk AND od.or_product_option = om.om_store_option_name LEFT JOIN options op ON om.option_fk = op.option_pk LEFT JOIN products pro ON pro.product_pk = op.product_fk

AND ${dateType} >= DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW() , INTERVAL -7 DAY), '%Y-%m-%d') AND ${dateType} < DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 DAY), '%Y-%m-%d')
AND ${dateType} >= #{dateStart} AND ${dateType} < DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(#{dateEnd}, INTERVAL 1 DAY), '%Y-%m-%d')

AND (or_delivery_invoice_number IS NULL OR or_delivery_invoice_number = '')
AND od.or_sending_deadline > DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d')
AND od.or_sending_deadline <= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d')

AND od.or_special_region_flag = 1 AND od.or_special_region_check_flag = 1

AND SUM(datas.or_cancled_qty) IS NULL
AND SUM(datas.or_cancled_qty) > 0
AND SUM(datas.or_amount) IS NULL
) inne

SELECT datas.or_serial_special_number, datas.or_buyer_id, datas.ss_name, datas.or_shipping_address_detail, datas.or_buyer_name, datas.or_receiver_name, datas.or_shipping_address, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT datas.or_delivery_invoice_number SEPARATOR ',') AS or_delivery_invoice_number, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT datas.or_delivery_company SEPARATOR ',') AS or_delivery_company, datas.or_buyer_contract_number1, datas.or_buyer_contract_number2, datas.or_receiver_contract_number1, datas.or_receiver_contract_number2, datas.or_order_number, datas.or_product_order_number, SUM(datas.or_total_price) AS or_total_price, COUNT(datas.or_pk) AS total_order_count, SUM(datas.or_amount) AS or_amount, SUM(datas.or_cancled_qty) AS or_cancled_qty, datas.or_sending_deadline, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT datas.or_sending_day SEPARATOR ',') AS or_sending_day, SUM(datas.or_refunds) AS or_refunds, datas.or_settlement_day, datas.total_amounts, datas.or_product, datas.or_product_option, datas.or_inflow_route, datas.product_name AS or_user_column1, datas.option_name AS or_user_column2, datas.edt_fk, IF( SUM(datas.or_deposit_flag) IS NULL, 0, 1 ) AS or_deposit_flag FROM ( SELECT od.or_serial_special_number, od.or_buyer_id, ss.ss_name, od.or_buyer_name, od.or_receiver_name, od.or_shipping_address, od.or_shipping_address_detail, od.or_delivery_invoice_number, od.or_delivery_company, od.or_buyer_contract_number1, od.or_buyer_contract_number2, od.or_receiver_contract_number1, od.or_receiver_contract_number2, od.or_order_number, od.or_product_order_number, od.or_pk, od.or_total_price, od.or_sending_deadline, od.or_sending_day, od.or_cancled_flag, od.or_refunds, od.or_settlement_day, od.edt_fk, CASE WHEN od.or_cancled_flag = 0 THEN SUM(od.or_amount) END AS or_amount, CASE WHEN od.or_cancled_flag = 1 THEN SUM(od.or_amount) END AS or_cancled_qty, SUM(od.or_amount * om.om_option_amount) AS total_amounts, od.or_product, od.or_product_option, od.or_inflow_route, pro.product_name, op.option_name, CASE WHEN od.or_deposit_flag = 0 THEN SUM(od.or_amount) END AS or_deposit_flag FROM orders od INNER JOIN store_section ss ON od.ss_fk = ss.ss_pk LEFT JOIN product_matching pm ON od.pm_fk = pm.pm_pk LEFT JOIN option_matching om ON om.pm_fk = pm.pm_pk AND od.or_product_option = om.om_store_option_name LEFT JOIN options op ON om.option_fk = op.option_pk LEFT JOIN products pro ON pro.product_pk = op.product_fk INNER JOIN ( SELECT od.or_serial_special_number, COUNT(od.or_serial_special_number) AS serial_count, SUM(od.or_inv_flag) AS total_flag FROM orders od LEFT JOIN product_matching pm ON od.pm_fk = pm.pm_pk LEFT JOIN option_matching om ON om.pm_fk = pm.pm_pk AND od.or_product_option = om.om_store_option_name LEFT JOIN options op ON om.option_fk = op.option_pk LEFT JOIN products pro ON pro.product_pk = op.product_fk
AND or_invoice_num_date IN
#{inoviceNum}
AND od.ss_fk = #{ssPk}
AND edt_fk = #{edtFk}
AND ${dateType} >= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d') AND ${dateType} < DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 DAY), '%Y-%m-%d')
AND ${dateType} >= DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW() , INTERVAL -7 DAY), '%Y-%m-%d') AND ${dateType} < DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 DAY), '%Y-%m-%d')
AND ${dateType} >= #{dateStart} AND ${dateType} < DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(#{dateEnd}, INTERVAL 1 DAY), '%Y-%m-%d')
AND od.or_regdate = #{insertingCount}
AND (or_delivery_invoice_number IS NOT NULL AND or_delivery_invoice_number != '')
AND (or_delivery_invoice_number IS NULL OR or_delivery_invoice_number = '')
AND od.or_sending_deadline > DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d')
AND od.or_sending_deadline <= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d')
AND od.or_request = ''
AND od.or_request != ''
AND od.or_sending_day IS NULL
AND od.or_sending_day IS NOT NULL
AND od.or_special_region_flag = 1
AND od.or_special_region_flag = 1 AND od.or_special_region_check_flag = 0
AND od.or_special_region_flag = 1 AND od.or_special_region_check_flag = 1
AND od.or_special_region_flag == 0
AND od.or_deposit_flag = 1
AND od.or_deposit_flag = 0
AND od.or_rec_type = 0
AND od.or_rec_type = 1
AND od.or_rec_type = 2
AND od.or_rec_type = 3
AND od.or_excel_div_flag = 1
AND od.or_fk != 0
AND ( od.or_excel_div_flag = 1 OR od.or_fk != 0 )
AND od.or_excel_div_flag = 0
AND od.or_fk = #{excelOrFk}
AND od.or_refunds != 0
AND od.or_refunds = 0
AND od.or_delivery_price > 0 AND od.or_delivery_discount_price = 0
AND (od.or_delivery_price = 0 OR od.or_delivery_discount_price > 0 )
AND (
or_buyer_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{specialNumber},'%') OR or_receiver_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{specialNumber},'%')
)
AND or_buyer_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND or_buyer_another_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND or_receiver_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND or_buyer_contract_number1 LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND or_receiver_contract_number1 LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND (
or_order_number = #{specialNumber}
)
AND or_delivery_invoice_number LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND (or_shipping_address_detail LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') OR or_shipping_address LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') )
AND or_delivery_message LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND or_product_order_number LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND ( or_product LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') OR or_product_option LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') )
AND pro.product_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND op.option_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
GROUP BY od.or_serial_special_number ) output ON od.or_serial_special_number = output.or_serial_special_number
WHERE
od.or_serial_special_number IN
od.or_serial_special_number NOT IN
( SELECT od.or_serial_special_number FROM orders od LEFT JOIN product_matching pm ON od.pm_fk = pm.pm_pk LEFT JOIN option_matching om ON om.pm_fk = pm.pm_pk AND od.or_product_option = om.om_store_option_name LEFT JOIN options op ON om.option_fk = op.option_pk LEFT JOIN products pro ON pro.product_pk = op.product_fk
AND or_invoice_num_date IN
#{inoviceNum}
AND od.ss_fk = #{ssPk}
AND edt_fk = #{edtFk}
AND ${dateType} >= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d') AND ${dateType} < DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 DAY), '%Y-%m-%d')
AND ${dateType} >= DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW() , INTERVAL -7 DAY), '%Y-%m-%d') AND ${dateType} < DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 DAY), '%Y-%m-%d')
AND ${dateType} >= #{dateStart} AND ${dateType} < DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(#{dateEnd}, INTERVAL 1 DAY), '%Y-%m-%d')
AND od.or_regdate = #{insertingCount}
AND (or_delivery_invoice_number IS NOT NULL AND or_delivery_invoice_number != '')
AND (or_delivery_invoice_number IS NULL OR or_delivery_invoice_number = '')
AND od.or_sending_deadline > DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d')
AND od.or_sending_deadline <= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d')
AND od.or_request = ''
AND od.or_request != ''
AND od.or_sending_day IS NULL
AND od.or_sending_day IS NOT NULL
AND od.or_special_region_flag = 1
AND od.or_special_region_flag = 1 AND od.or_special_region_check_flag = 0
AND od.or_special_region_flag = 1 AND od.or_special_region_check_flag = 1
AND od.or_special_region_flag == 0
AND od.or_deposit_flag = 1
AND od.or_deposit_flag = 0
AND od.or_rec_type = 0
AND od.or_rec_type = 1
AND od.or_rec_type = 2
AND od.or_rec_type = 3
AND od.or_excel_div_flag = 1
AND od.or_fk != 0
AND ( od.or_excel_div_flag = 1 OR od.or_fk != 0 )
AND od.or_excel_div_flag = 0
AND od.or_fk = #{excelOrFk}
AND od.or_refunds != 0
AND od.or_refunds = 0
AND od.or_delivery_price > 0 AND od.or_delivery_discount_price = 0
AND (od.or_delivery_price = 0 OR od.or_delivery_discount_price > 0 )
AND ( or_buyer_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchAddKeyword},'%') OR or_receiver_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchAddKeyword},'%') )
AND or_buyer_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchAddKeyword},'%')
AND or_receiver_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchAddKeyword},'%')
AND or_buyer_contract_number1 LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchAddKeyword},'%')
AND or_receiver_contract_number1 LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchAddKeyword},'%')
AND or_order_number LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchAddKeyword},'%')
AND or_delivery_invoice_number LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchAddKeyword},'%')
AND (or_shipping_address_detail LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchAddKeyword},'%') OR or_shipping_address LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchAddKeyword},'%') )
AND or_delivery_message LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchAddKeyword},'%')
AND or_product_order_number LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchAddKeyword},'%')
AND ( or_product LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchAddKeyword},'%') OR or_product_option LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchAddKeyword},'%') )
AND pro.product_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchAddKeyword},'%')
AND op.option_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchAddKeyword},'%')
GROUP BY od.or_serial_special_number )
GROUP BY od.or_serial_special_number, od.or_buyer_id, ss.ss_name, od.or_buyer_name, od.or_receiver_name, od.or_shipping_address, od.or_shipping_address_detail, od.or_delivery_invoice_number, od.or_delivery_company, od.or_buyer_contract_number1, od.or_buyer_contract_number2, od.or_receiver_contract_number1, od.or_receiver_contract_number2, od.or_order_number, od.or_product_order_number, od.or_pk, or_amount, od.or_total_price, od.or_sending_deadline, od.or_sending_day, od.or_cancled_flag, od.or_refunds, od.or_settlement_day, od.or_product, od.or_product_option, od.or_inflow_route, pro.product_name, op.option_name, od.edt_fk ORDER BY od.or_settlement_day DESC ) datas GROUP BY datas.or_serial_special_number, datas.or_buyer_id, datas.ss_name, datas.or_buyer_name, datas.or_receiver_name, datas.or_shipping_address, datas.or_shipping_address_detail, datas.or_buyer_contract_number1, datas.or_buyer_contract_number2, datas.or_receiver_contract_number1, datas.or_receiver_contract_number2, datas.or_order_number, datas.or_product_order_number, datas.or_sending_deadline, datas.or_product, datas.or_product_option, datas.or_inflow_route, datas.or_settlement_day, datas.total_amounts, datas.product_name, datas.option_name, datas.edt_fk
AND SUM(datas.or_cancled_qty) IS NULL
AND SUM(datas.or_cancled_qty) > 0
AND SUM(datas.or_amount) IS NULL
ORDER BY or_settlement_day DESC
